title: VTOL Takeoff: Use global position instead of home for takoeff

conversation.author: RomanBapst
conversation.body:
### Solved Problem
When the vehicle home position does not coincide with the takeoff position the vehicle drifts off towards the home position during takeoff which is not the expected behavior.


### Solution
- Use global position for takeoff instead of home position.

### Changelog Entry
For release notes:
```
Bugfix: 
Prevent VTOL Takeoff from drifting during takeoff ascent when home position does not coincide with takeoff position.
```

review_comments.author: sfuhrer
review_comments.body: What happens actually if that's not fulfilled?

review_comments.author: RomanBapst
review_comments.body: @sfuhrer Then the triplet will not be published and not takeoff will happen.
